TopicTitle: Do the ancient astronauts theorist people even try?

Articles.Content:
I mean seriously it's some of the most baseless and monumentally misinformed speculation I've ever seen. It's hilarious.

How was this done? Well, we could put a little research into possible techniques and examine the information we already have about the society... nah... let's just say aliens did it. They'd probably have advanced tech so we don't really have to think too much about how it was done. Besides, I saw something earlier that looked kinda spacelike.

They're a mixed bag of total nitwits, conspiracy theorists, hardcore atheists, and old fashioned believers in the idea that without technology of at least the current level nothing can be achieved.

So we have people who think "the government" is hiding "the truth about aliens" which logically leads to aliens being here.

Combine that with being atheists so needing an explanation for people being religious, and as we all know people tend to think things they don't understand are caused by the gods, so ancient people must have (because they were stupid and ignorant) have seen aliens and think they were gods.

Then of course they built large temples to those gods, but without modern technology that would have been impossible (according to the ancient astronauts nutters) so it must have been those same aliens building those temples and pyramids (there's a small subset that believes the ancient aliens aren't aliens at all but time travelers).

About the most ridiculous theory was aired as fact by the history channel around easter this year, claiming the resurrection of Christ was actually an alien feigning death being pulled out of Christ's (who was an alien, as is god they claimed) grave by a teleporter device, and later teleported back down (hence the glow around him, obviously).

What I love is all the theories about various things being used as methods of alien communication and as things like bases and landing pads and all that. They have advanced technology, intergalactic travel, teleportation and levitation beams etc. but they can't use basic telecommunications or make any sort of professional metalurgy when designing their bases on Earth, they make everything from stone.

Oh yeah, and sometimes alien technology also explains things like flat topped mountains (Clearly not a natural phenomena).

There are plenty of other sites welcoming the discussion of conspiracy theories.

On KSP forums, discussion of them is against the rules.

Locked.
